body_html: In the gpu_device.cc file, the BaseGPUDevice::RequiresRecordingAccessedTensors() function return false since streams_.size() returns 1. So tensors allocated in a kernel's compute() method aren't recorded. No TensorReference will be created.
body_text: In the gpu_device.cc file, the BaseGPUDevice::RequiresRecordingAccessedTensors() function return false since streams_.size() returns 1. So tensors allocated in a kernel's compute() method aren't recorded. No TensorReference will be created.
body: In the gpu_device.cc file, the BaseGPUDevice::RequiresRecordingAccessedTensors() function return false since streams_.size() returns 1. So tensors allocated in a kernel's compute() method aren't recorded. No TensorReference will be created.
